languages.text: {n}Куда бы ни вещал покойник свои безумные проповеди, в эфире царит лишь шум помех. На миг вам кажется, что вы услышали голос Вигдис, но он тут же растворяется в статике.{/n}

{n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Куда бы ни вещал покойник свои безумные проповеди, в эфире царит лишь шум помех. На миг вам кажется, что вы услышали голос Вигдис, но он тут же растворяется в статике.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wherever it is that the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you've heard Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

{n}Wherever it is that the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you've heard Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

{n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

{n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

{n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dondequiera que se emitan los dementes sermones del muerto, lo único que oyes es estática. Por un momento te parece oír la voz de Vigdis, pero la estática pronto se la traga.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dondequiera que se emitan los dementes sermones del muerto, lo único que oyes es estática. Por un momento te parece oír la voz de Vigdis, pero la estática pronto se la traga.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尽管你不知道那个人疯狂的祈祷究竟被广播到了哪里，但空气中只传来了嘶嘶的静电声。有那么一瞬间，你感觉似乎听到了维格迪斯的声音，但它随后就消失在了静电声中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尽管你不知道那个人疯狂的祈祷究竟被广播到了哪里，但空气中只传来了嘶嘶的静电声。有那么一瞬间，你感觉似乎听到了维格迪斯的声音，但它随后就消失在了静电声中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あちこちで死者の狂った説教が流れていて、空電が包むように満たしている。一瞬ヴィグディスの声がしたと思ったが、それはすぐに空電の中に溶けていった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あちこちで死者の狂った説教が流れていて、空電が包むように満たしている。一瞬ヴィグディスの声がしたと思ったが、それはすぐに空電の中に溶けていった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Wohin auch immer die wahnsinnigen Predigten des toten Mannes ausgestrahlt werden, in der Luft ist nur Rauschen. Für einen Moment glaubst du Vigdis' Stimme zu hören, doch sie löst sich in dem Rauschen sofort wieder auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Wohin auch immer die wahnsinnigen Predigten des toten Mannes ausgestrahlt werden, in der Luft ist nur Rauschen. Für einen Moment glaubst du Vigdis' Stimme zu hören, doch sie löst sich in dem Rauschen sofort wieder auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Où que les sermons déments du mort soient transmis, il n'y a plus que des grésillements sur la ligne. L'espace d'un instant, il vous semble entendre la voix de Vigdis, mais elle se dissout immédiatement dans les parasites.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Où que les sermons déments du mort soient transmis, il n'y a plus que des grésillements sur la ligne. L'espace d'un instant, il vous semble entendre la voix de Vigdis, mais elle se dissout immédiatement dans les parasites.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ölü adamın hastalıklı vaazları yayımlanırken cızırtının sesi havayı dolduruyor. Bir anlığına Vigdis'in sesini duyar gibi oluyorsun ancak cızırtı, bu sesi de yutuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Wherever the dead man's insane sermons are being broadcast to, static is all that fills the air. For a moment you think you hear Vigdis's voice, only for it to dissolve immediately in the static.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ölü adamın hastalıklı vaazları yayımlanırken cızırtının sesi havayı dolduruyor. Bir anlığına Vigdis'in sesini duyar gibi oluyorsun ancak cızırtı, bu sesi de yutuyor.{/n}
